column4: Walt Disney Co said on Friday

column2: UPDATE 3-U.S. Congress extends transport funding though May
column4: July 31 The U.S. Congress on Thursday approved a $10.9 billion funding extension for transportation construction projects through May 2015
column5: averting a cutback in federal payments to states that was due to start on Friday.

column2: Weyerhaeuser quarterly profit rises 43 pct Aug 1 Timber conglomerate Weyerhaeuser Co's  second-quarter profit rose 43 percent
column3: helped by higher sales in its wood products and cellulose fiber businesses.

column2: Yum pledges to improve China supply chain oversight SHANGHAI
column3: Aug 1 Yum Brands Inc on Friday said it would strengthen oversight of its China supply chain after it severed ties with supplier OSI China following a food safety scandal.
